thread.title: Fight Over Donald Trump’s Travel Ban Won’t End With Appeals Ruling
thread.title_full: Fight Over Donald Trump’s Travel Ban Won’t End With Appeals Ruling - WSJ

author: Jacob Gershman
title: Fight Over Donald Trump’s Travel Ban Won’t End With Appeals Ruling
text:
The legal struggle over President Donald Trump’s executive order on immigration at the moment rests with three federal appeals judges. But experts say the path of litigation is wending toward the Supreme Court, possibly teeing up a chance for the eight justices to rule on a key Trump administration platform mere weeks into the presidential term.
Sooner or later, the justices, experts say, will likely settle the question of whether Mr. Trump’s order was a legal and constitutional exercise of his authority. The Jan. 27...
